definitions.definition: An N-methylated indoleamine derivative , a serotonergic hallucinogen found in several plants, especially Prestonia amazonica ( Apocynaceae ), and in mammalian brain, blood , and urine.

main_definition: An N-methylated indoleamine derivative , a serotonergic hallucinogen found in several plants, especially Prestonia amazonica ( Apocynaceae ), and in mammalian brain, blood , and urine.
